tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Pregnancy care and management,
review: To say Dr. Mridula Devi was a god-send to us is an understatement. We visited A LOT of gynecologists and we were never able to stick to one. We had a previous pregnancy loss, so we were on the lookout for a doctor who was compassionate and understanding. During our first consult,we were very happy with her calming presence and friendly reassurance and decided to continue with her. She was attentive, always answered any question of ours (even if they were silly) without trying to brush it off, made sure to listen and be understanding of our feelings and worries, she recommended the best of specialists and ensured that she always was available to us. Throughout the tough pregnancy, anytime we were worried, we would would reach out to her and she'd support us! All thanks to her, we have our baby girl with us now and we will be eternally grateful to her for being the kind of support we needed. We would definitely recommend her to anyone looking for a great Doctor who can empathize with you and be with you every step of the way.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ** *** **** ******* * **** *** ** ***** Dr. Mridula’s friendliness, patience and attention to detail made my journey with her effortless.. she puts you at ease and listens patiently.. she is vigilant in her treatment plan and makes sure you get the best out of treatment.. Doctors with such warmth are rare to come across..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have consulted doctor Mridula for my two pregnancies. She always helps and provide good guidance on every step of the pregnacy. 
Thank you doctor for helping and  providing good guidance throughout my pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Mridula for pregnancy check up. She is very quick at her work, and explained things to the point. My pregnancy and delivery was a breeze, all thanks to Dr Mridula. I have been and will recommend her to my friends and family

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
My wife and I had the pleasure of having Doctor Mridula as our OB/GYN during my wife's pregnancy

From the very first appointment, Doctor Mridula put us at ease with her extensive knowledge and compassionate bedside manner. She took the time to listen to all of our questions and concerns and always made us feel like we were in good hands.

Throughout my wife's pregnancy, Doctor Mridula provided exceptional care, always keeping us informed and involved in every step of the process. She was always available to answer our questions and concerns, and we always felt like we had her full attention and support.

When the delivery date came in, She remained calm and focused throughout the entire process, guiding my wife through each step with patience and kindness. 

Thanks to Doctor Mridula's expertise and care, we were blessed with a beautiful, healthy baby girl. We are forever grateful to her for the exceptional care she provided to our family, and we would recommend her to anyone seeking the very best in medical care during pregnancy and childbirth. She truly is a phenomenal doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
First day of consultation with Dr. Mriduladevi we instantly liked her approach and decided to stick with her. Her support & guidance did helped my pregnancy smooth & Comfortable throughout. She makes herself available for any queries/concerns over mobile whenever required. I, appreciate her patience, knowledge, guidance and support which made us feel confident with regards to self and baby health. She ensures husband also to be part in every scans/tests and making both us understand clearly with explanation using monitor or images on baby growth. Her dedication is also to be applaud. Upon parents visit during consultation, I remember they had multiple questions which she answered very patiently. She encourages to have positive approach in all aspects so to have safe labour. 

 

During labour, I am very thankful to her. I was little difficult to her in labour room insisting her to go for C-section due to pain for long hours, instead she made me comfort & encouraged to have normal delivery which she made it. I am ever grateful for her and my baby girl. Wholeheartedly, Confidently & Strongly, I recommend her. ***** *** **** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am very much blessed to have doctor like her during my pregnancy. Mrudula mam is very friendly and kind hearted, her way of explaining about the issues was very nice. After 9years of marriage I am get pregnant and it was my 1st baby. 
I am very much thankful to mam  Because my dream of getting my baby and having complete family comes true by Mrudula mam.  In my 28th week I get labour pain even water also discharged in mid night it happened we went to hospital immediately I didn't call Mrudula mam on that mid night I just texted I am getting very much pain that's it.  After seeing my mssg mam only call and gave some instructions even before we reach Hospital mam already came to hospital it was already 2. AM time 
Seriously I went so many Hospitals and met so many doctors but didn't see this much of dedication in her work and friendliness with her patiences. Seriously god is not able to be anywhere  that's the reason he gave doctors like Mrudula mam 
From my bottom of my heart am saying thank you but its very small word she save me and my child on that critical condition.
Thank you soooooooo much  mam

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I am very much blessed to get doctor like Dr.Mridula Mam for my pregnancy. Due to hurdles faced in my first pregnancy and which I couldn’t be able to sustain, I was so scared when I conceived for the second time. But doctor made it very smooth by giving me all hopes and kept track of all my previous issues. Every time I visit doctor for consultation or scan I used to go home with all positive vibes. She is very friendly, approachable and always reachable through WhatsApp or call. I was scared in every stage of pregnancy due to my previous issue. But she took deep care and During delivery oh god she is so cool and was made me to feel relaxed and in few mins C-section happened and I am blessed with twins. There is a saying if god takes one and he will always gives back in double. That’s my belief and it happened all because of mam. I would recommend Dr.Mridula mam for smooth pregnancy. Also I would like to express my deepest gratitude for giving support for all the pregnant ladies out there. Thank you so much Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We had our baby thru Surrogacy and travel to Bangalore was not possible during this pandemic situation. We met Dr. Mridula no sooner we were shifted from the gynaecology department when our surrogate mommy was 3 months into her pregnancy. My first meeting with Dr. Mridula become my last meeting as we were unable to travel due to the pandemic situation. However, she assured us the special care they would take of our surrogate mommy as travel was going to be very tough for the next few months. Her happy and comforting nature made it easy for us to be at peace. She was accessible throughout our pregnancy journey and at no point did we feel deprived of not physically being at Bangalore during our pregnancy journey. Her experience coupled with her happy personality added to our comfort levels as we were assured that we were in very safe hands. We would be indebted to Dr. Mridula for delivering the most precious gift to us, which is our little princess. I still cannot forget the moment when she came out of the OT announcing our little princess.  We cant thank you enough Dr. Mridula.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,
review:
Dr Mridula is very friendly , extremely helpful and very much approachable for any queries 24/7 . She treats her patients with utmost care and is extremely dedicated to her work and profession.
The effort she had put in for my delivery is really appreciable, she in fact turned up almost 6-8 times even in late nights during delivery time. She believes in normal delivery and tries her best for that.In fact I could have never ever succeeded having a normal delivery  without her support and care.
Prior to my consulting with her, I had had a late miscarriage earlier and keeping this history in mind , Dr. Mridula took care of all risk factors to pre-empt and ensure that those conditions do not repeat. Most importantly, she explained patiently each and every medication, the reasoning behind her advice etc.  making us very comfortable.I am pretty sure it is just because of her risk mitigation plan that with the required medications and supplements, that I have had a safe and successful pregnancy. She is also extremely responsive in answering our queries or need for advice during odd hours giving us complete peace of mind. She is a wonderful Dr. and I am so grateful & glad that she handled my pregnancy !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Scan,Labor and Delivery,
review:
Dr.mridula mam was truly a gift to us. Thanks to Dr.deepika for referring. Ever since i met her from my 1st trimester of Twin pregnancy at MILAAN Kumarakrupa west, I continued consulting Dr.mridula for my pregnancy check up & post delivery check up. she explained each step of pregnancy till delivery & post delivery. Dr. explained the issues surrounding twin pregnancy in general & advised special attention & care . she is very humble, down to earth person.


On the day of my early delivery during covid lockdown. Dr.mridula was called for emergency from her home. Even though it was raining heavily on the delivery day, Doctor scaned me first & was there before i got shifted to operation theatre. Doctor explained me and my husband about the situation for pre-term delivery of my babies, I Thank her so much for the timely intervention & exceptional care. It was bz of you and your team that we are happy today, we now have our bundle of joy having twins, very safely and healthily delivered into the world. You made our dreams of having a complete family come true. 

As God could not be everywhere he made sure that we have doctors like Mriduladevi . I am so glad, I came to her during my pregnancy. I am so thankful to her for treating me so tenderly. I also thank her from the bottom of my heart for being so patient with me . I know I was difficult at times (by calling her at evening & even at night time) during my risk in  twin pregnancy . Even if she was busy, her words of support to me has really meant a lot. I feel very healthy & mentally much stronger now. Me & my husband will remember you until our last breath . You will always be in my prayers... God bless you abundantly 
Thank you so much.  


Last but not least i am very happy with her friendly nature , soft spokeness  and her patience in listening & answering  to all our doubts by giving us sufficient time.
Once again thank you soooooooooo much.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: My name is zeeshan this side im gratified to have a specialist Gynecologist like Dr Mridula she monitored My wife Asma Right from the day of conception till the delivery perhaps has have done my wife delivery  ,she has helped us get a save delivery we are immensely thankful to Dr Mridula ,just incredible treatment we had i suggest others who is viewing our review to just close the eyes and visit Dr she will not let you guys go empty handed i could say she is an expertise And a  pro in her domain of treating infertility  ,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We visited Dr. Mridula Devi A, for my fibroids removal surgery. I was having intense pain from last 2 years and got checked at other hospitals (even in Canada) but nothing improved. So we reached out to Dr. Kamini Rao and she directed us to Dr. Mridula Devi. She is so friendly and listens to all your concerns and motivates us to be positive.  
She explained everything in detail and also guided us on what needs to be done  going forward.  Along with fibroids, she even removed ovarian cyst and ensured I am free from all issues what I was having from last 2 years.
She is easily available for FU after surgery and always responds to the calls if it is an emergency. We asked many questions, few might be silly but for everything she answered with the smile. Very happy to get this doctor as my Gynecologist. 
I will always recommend Dr. Mridula Devi A, for any gynecology issues. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am penning this down with tears in my eyes. I have no words to express to my gratitude to Dr. Mridula Ma'am. Mine was a high risk pregnancy coz i was diabetic. With her expert treatment and guidance, I delivered a baby boy at 36th week due to baby being low birth weight and growth restrictions.Every time I visited the clinic in a tensed mood, a quick chat with Mridula Ma'am would brighten my mood. Her ever smiling face will cure most of our tensions. She was always approachable to me over phone and WhatsApp. Thank you Mridula Ma'am for bringing light to our lives. God bless you and your family always🙏🏾

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was introduced to Doctor Mrudula Devi when I had my bleeding during my pregnancy 3rd month . I thought everything is over but doctor Mrudula Devi helped me get the right treatment at the right time and controlled the bleeding which was due to subchoronic haemorrhage and later my preclampsia issues were also addressed so well on time she is always available to the patients and gives them priority. One of my twin had a fetal demise but she managed to keep up my pregnancy as the other twin was healthy and delivered in my 35th week. She is soft spoken and friendly we feel comfortable to go to her as well. Now I am blessed with a baby girl and am really thankful to doctor Mrudula Devi for her kind gesture and right treatment and guidance on time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,Caesarean Section (C Section),Lower Segment Caesarean Section (LSCS),Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: My experience with Dr. Mriduladevi throughout pregnancy and after delivery also, was very nice. She treats her patients with utmost care. She answers all the queries and explains each and every thing deeply. No matter how many questions we ask, how many times we ask she will answer all the questions very nicely and very patiently. Because of Dr. Mriduladevi my journey of pregnancy was very smooth.  And after delivery, because of her counseling and mental support, I was able to cope up with the challenges a new mother faces.  I strongly recommend Dr. Mriduladevi for consultation and treatment in pregnancy and related issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Would like to tell about Dr.Mridula Devi, 
Wow from where i start she is the BEST doctor who took care of me during my pregnancy tenure. Every-time you visit her you can feel the positive vibes and she is so calm, You will forget all your worries and enjoy pregnancy also she will available whenever you need her.  She made sure that I deliver my princes through normal procedure only. I recommend Dr.Mridula Devi to all pregnant ladies. She is very approachable. You can message to her in whatsapp and she will reply immediately. Also Milann JP nagar have good staff with good hospitality.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted to Dr.mridula devi madam for my pregnancy im very much satisifed the way doctor supported me and giving suggestion for my healthy pregnancy journey and kept me positive when i was covid positive patient in my pregnancy even at the time of delivery in O.T too . Im happy to make important addition a baby in my life a moment to cherish .I express my deep sense of gratitude and moral support you been extending is matchless... Im obliged by your sense of absolute professionalism with which you have taken care of both of us. Thank you madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: It was an emergency ectopic surgery , my radiologist suggested Mridula Devi mam, the minute we contacted her she accepted to be in hospital with in 15min and told us to get admitted as soon as possible , before getting me into to OT she handled and explained everything about the issue so well dat i never felt panic after it ,  this oly shows how knowledgeable she is 👌 dat ever smiling face made me feel im in safe hands ! Within 2 hrs my surgery was done and the very next day i was discharged ! Thank you doctor for all the care taken 🙏🏻

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Tests,Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Scan,Pregnancy with PCOD,
review: Initially i was getting treatment for Pcod and ovulation induction for pregnancy. I was pregnant and was introduced to Dr. Mridula. She has been taking care for me since 2nd month. Being very curious about first pregnancy, i always ask her many doubts. She is very patient and answers all my questions and doubts. I feel very comfortable to talk to her about anything be it about pregnancy or my well being. She is always ther for me. She never calls unnecessary for visits unless absolutely necessary which is appreciated as there is pandemic situation. She has great care for her patients. I highly recommend her for all the people who are looking for the best doctor to consult during pregnancy. Thank you so much doctor for always being there for me whenever I needed you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr.Mridula Devi is a perfect amalgamation of an empathetic person and an expert obstetrician. I consulted her for my twin pregnancy- which had some complications . Her expertise in obstetric field helped out to identify a rare complication during pregnancy. She closely monitored me to ensure good health of babies. Though babies were born prematurely, both babies were healthy. This was primarily because of her timely diagnosis and close monitoring.During my emergency hospital admissions at unusual hours, she had always coordinated well with the hospital duty staffs. In addition, she always answered to all the quires and worries through messages and calls which helped me to successfully complete my pregnancy.  I highly recommend her for any obstretic related consultation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I got my treatment done from Milan center for IVF, after I got pregnant I was introduced to Dr Mriduladevi by our doctor. she was very welcoming and very understanding with our situation. We were nervous with the on going pandemic and going through this alone as young couples she was supportive and guided us all the 9 months. She was very fast in replying to all doubts and wats app messages. She was always a click away.when I started to show symptoms of delivery she came immediately and delivered of baby girl without any complications. I felt very comfortable with her in going through all the procedures. We highly recommend you to vist her for any Gynaecology related issues. she will definitely make you feel comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Maternal Care/ Checkup,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Other Gynaecological Conditions, Prenatal Care,
review: I am happy and satisfied with the treatment given by Dr Mridula. *** ** *** ** *** ****** ************* * **** **** ********** Her complete examination and diagnosis are impressive. The best part is she gives enough time to patient to ask their doubts and clarify them with patience . She is not only a good doctor but a good human being as she understands the anxiety of patients and gives the best solution. Her support throughout my pregnancy was unmatchable. I would highly recommend this doctor to my family and friends. All Thanks to Dr Mridula for helping me to be a happy mother.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.Mridula was absolutely amazing... she is very responsive and ensures she does the best for you...she is just the support I needed....She hand held us through each and every stage... she is very kind and sweet.... she will ensure all your doubts are clarified and she will respond to you so soon as she can... she took extraordinary care of me and ensured the safe delivery of my daughter...the hospital staff are very helpful and cooperative.. they have been very attentive throughout my pregnancy and delivery.....we are very thankful to Dr.Mridula and the entire milann team

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was consulting Dr. Mridula for prenatal care. She is one of the finest obstetrician of Milan. She has been like a friend during my pregnancy journey and has a lot of patience and compassion. The way she handled my delivery was outstanding. Though i always wanted a normal delivery, i gave up at the end and wanted to go for a c section. Dr.Mridula stepped in and convinced me to continue with normal delivery as there wasn’t any need for a c section. What she did for me was more than a doctor does for her patients. We feel so lucky to have got her as our doctor. We got our bundle of joy and all thanks to the Milan team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Even though I met Dr. Mridula at the fag end of my pregnancy due to covid situation, she was super helpful and explained every single thing that was required for delivery. She was extremely professional and followed up on all minute details until I was discharged. She’s very approachable and patient to answer every question. Totally recommend her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Went in for my pre pregnancy consultation, delivery and post pregnancy consultation. Had wonderful journey through out pregnancy. She is very friendly and have lot of patience. We used to ask a lot of queries and she used to answer each one. She also used to respond to our queries via phone as required. Would definitely recommend her. Thank you Dr. Without you we wouldn’t have the such amazing journey throughout pregnancy.

review: I was patient of Dr Mridula from my 3rd month of pregnancy till delivery. Very friendly understands the problem and provides  good suggestions and available anytime through phone or messages whenever emergency. Had a good experience to take treatment.I was carrying twins but it was an easy experience throughout pregnancy with hope of Doctor made me confident till delivery. Thanks for Dr mridula for blessing me a safe pregnancy

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I met mridhula devi doctor when I was two months pregnant..She is very friendly and always reachable..she clearly explains baby's growth patiently after every scan..She is very kind and supportive..her words gave me strength for easy pregnency and recovery..I would recommend this doctor for happy pregnancy :)

review: coming from another city, we were very apprehensive about finding a doctor who could relate to us. we found Dr Mridula A very professional and was able to put our concerns to rest. we would highly recommend maam for all maternity related queries . Considering it was the initial days of the pandemic, she always found time for tele-consultations and always addressed our queries. thank you maam.

review: Dr Mridula is very friendly and approachable. I had high risk pregnancy. I was given sufficient attention and care and was explained treatment and given prevention tips to avoid any untoward incident at every step of pregnancy, delivery and post delivery. I would recommend Dr Mridula's to all my acquaintance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Mridula is a superb doctor who follows step by step process and is very clear about the line of treatment she follows. She makes patient comfortable and the way of explaining the procedure is also very good. Even for complicated cases she is most of the time present in the scan room. For any gynaecological problem she is most recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have consulted Dr.Mridula devi for pregnancy check-up and post delivery checkup, she is very friendly and listens to the patients with patience, she explains the issues in detail and treats the patients  very well *** *** ** *** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** ** ****... So I recommend all to consult her for pregnancy checkups and post delivery checkup.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnant Women Counseling,Caesarean Section (C Section),Nutrition for Pregnant Women,Pregnancy Scan,Pregnancy care and management,
review: Dr. Mridula has been simply superb. My wife and I recently had a healthy baby boy and thanks to Dr Mridula, my wife has had a good experience throughout the three trimesters. We had challenges having a baby in past years and have faced several disappointments but thanks to the team at Milann, we are now parents. Dr. Mridula took a lot of care to ensure that from the early stages of pregnancy, various conditions were checked and constantly advised us in the dos and donts throughout the pregnancy from diet to exercise, sleep and medication. Dr Mridula always went one step further to sate our curiosity about the many tests and metrics and answered all of our questions patiently. I’m grateful that we were able to avail high quality treatment like this right here in Bangalore from Dr Mridula at Milann hospital. Thank you Dr Mridula from me and my family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: After long years of infertility treatment, we got naturally conceived and moved to gynec department where we met Dr.Mridula. She is very soft spoken and was available when ever we need any help. Our pregnancy journey was a rollercoaster. Our baby got detected with cleft lip and palate in scan. We were mentally shattered. Throughout this phase she supported us.  We were not sure how to deal with it. She helped and guided me as a sister. We were prepared to receive our gift of god with her help. Dr.Mridula is our life saver. Thank you for your patience and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am so lucky that I have met her during my crucial time of pregnancy and I am thankful to Dr. Kamini Rao that she referred me to her. I strongly recommend her ** *** ** *** **** ******* ********* ** ******* She is always accessable over phone and in hospital when ever you need her. She is so friendly and always approachable. She always gave me strong motivation and supported me till my delivery and afterwards as well. Whatever I say about her is not enough for me. I am blessed with a baby only because of her. *** ** ****** ******** *** *** ***

review: Dr. Mriduladevi has been very supportive. From the very first time of consultation,  doctor has been very friendly and gave lot of courage to my wife. The doctor would review our reports and quickly suggest the remedies.  During third trimester,  she would even attend our calls during late night in case of emergencies. We are blessed to be associated with Dr Mriduladevi. She always listen to us with patience and provide valuable inputs.
